---
title: "Unlock Labs Feature Announcement: Mint Memberships and Subscriptions Directly Within Farcaster Frames"
subtitle: ""
authorName: "Unlock Protocol"
publishDate: "Tue Oct 29 2024 16:23:50 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)"
description: "Unlock Labs checkouts for subscriptions and memberships can now be seamlessly shared and embedded as mintable Farcaster Frames."
image: "/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--mint-memberships-and-subscriptions-directly-within-farcaster-frames/cab8c1cde0e0268d8d284a4eb8696b6a.jpg"
---

![Unlock Labs Feature Announcement: Mint Memberships and Subscriptions Directly Within Farcaster Frames](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/cab8c1cde0e0268d8d284a4eb8696b6a.jpg)

<p>We're thrilled to announce that Unlock Labs checkouts for subscriptions and memberships can now be seamlessly shared and embedded as mintable Farcaster Frames! This integration means that creators and communities can offer memberships and subscriptions directly to fans and subscribers within the Farcaster ecosystem, enhancing user experience and expanding their reach.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-unlocking-new-possibilities-with-farcaster">Unlocking New Possibilities with Farcaster</h2></div><p>Farcaster has rapidly emerged as a leading decentralized social network and community. With the introduction of Farcaster Frames, users can embed interactive content directly into their casts, enriching the platform's dynamic environment.</p><p>By integrating Unlock checkouts into Farcaster Frames, we've bridged the gap between creator community engagement and membership access. This means your fans and followers can now mint memberships and subscriptions without ever leaving a Farcaster feed such as those in Warpcast.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-why-this-integration-matters">Why This Integration Matters</h2></div><ul><li><p><strong>Seamless User Experience</strong>: Fans can purchase subscriptions directly within Farcaster apps, eliminating the need to navigate to external websites.</p></li><li><p><strong>Enhanced Engagement</strong>: Creators can promote exclusive content, events, or access more effectively by simplifying the checkout process.</p></li><li><p><strong>Decentralized and Open</strong>: Both Unlock Protocol and Farcaster share a commitment to decentralization and open-source principles, ensuring transparency and user control.</p></li></ul><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-how-it-works">How It Works</h2></div><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://unlock-protocol.com/guides/onchain-subscriptions/"><strong>Create Your Subscription</strong></a>: Set up your membership or subscription using Unlock Protocol's dashboard or smart contracts.</p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://docs.unlock-protocol.com/tools/checkout/"><strong>Generate the Checkout URL</strong></a>: Obtain your unique checkout link for the membership offering.</p></li><li><p><strong>Paste the Checkout URL into a Farcaster Frame</strong>: Share the checkout link within a Farcaster Frame in your cast.</p></li><li><p><strong>Users Mint Directly</strong>: Your audience can interact with the frame to purchase memberships without leaving the platform.</p></li></ul><p></p><figure float="none" width="578px" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: 578px;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--mint-memberships-and-subscriptions-directly-within-farcaster-frames/0f0847b38bd327bfcb49d270e50ad9f7.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1822" nextwidth="2464" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-getting-started">Getting Started</h2></div><p>To get started:</p><ul><li><p><strong>For Creators</strong></p><ul><li><p>Visit the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://unlock-protocol.com/">Unlock Protocol website</a> and set up your membership contract.</p></li><li><p>Create a checkout with the checkout builder and copy your checkout URL for your subscription.</p></li><li><p>Paste the chekcout URL into a Farcaster Frame when composing your cast.</p></li></ul></li><li><p><strong>For Fans</strong></p><ul><li><p>Interact with casts featuring a checkout frame.</p></li><li><p>Mint memberships or subscriptions seamlessly right from your feed.</p></li></ul></li></ul><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-empowering-creator-communities">Empowering Creator Communities</h2></div><p>This capability is a significant step toward simplifying decentralized commerce and strengthening community engagement for creators. By combining the strengths of Unlock Protocol's membership approach with Farcaster's vibrant social network, we're enabling new forms of creator and fan interaction.</p><p></p>
